thread.title: Small plane crashes into 2 homes in Riverside, causing fire
thread.title_full: Small plane crashes into 2 homes in Riverside, causing fire

author: Cindy Chang, Joseph Serna
title: Small plane crashes into 2 homes in Riverside, causing fire
text:
Small plane crashes into 2 homes in Riverside, causing fire Plane crashes into home in Riverside KTLA At least one house was fully engulfed in flames after a small plane headed from Riverside to San Jose crashed Monday afternoon. At least one house was fully engulfed in flames after a small plane headed from Riverside to San Jose crashed Monday afternoon. (KTLA) Cindy Chang and Joseph Serna 
About 30 people were evacuated from nearby homes to Nichols Park, Payne said.
